doc.str: Systems and methods for treatment of liquid solutions for use with livestock operations

Methods and systems for enhancing of quality of liquid by treating a source liquid to enhance the concentration of low zeta potential crystals and produce a treated liquid having a higher concentration of low zeta potential crystals that that of the source liquid. The inventive system comprises an aqueous liquid source having a threshold concentration of selected minerals and a low zeta potential crystal generator for treating the aqueous source liquid to produce treated liquid having an enhanced concentration of low zeta potential crystals, and at least one filtration device for substantially removing bacteria, viruses, cysts, and the like from the treated source liquid.

Atkins, Physical Chemistry 6th Ed., 1999, W.H. Freeman and Co., pp. 253-266 and 937. cited by other . | Turbu-Flow Corporation, "Turbu-Flow Corporate Literature," Oct. 16, 2003 (accessed via www.archive.org, searched for www.turbu-flow.com.au; full address of reference: http://web.archive.org/web/20031218203111/ww.turbu-flow.com.au/products/t- ufpool.htm). cited by other . | Zeta Rod, "Zeta Rod Corporate Literature," Sep. 28, 2002 (accessed via www.archive.org, searched for www.zetarod.com; full address of reference: http://web.archive.org/web/20021202090451/www.zetarod.com/hvacrtop.shtml)- . cited by other.
SPECKMAN, ANN W. SLEATH, JANET SPECKMAN LAW GROUP PLLC
